title: SUPERAntiSpyware Professional 6.0.1212 Multilingual + Keys

To effectively deal with spyware modules and malicious software, the utility automatically updates its database via the Internet.

Key features and specifications SUPERAntiSpyware:

* Quick, complete and custom scanning of hard drives, removable drives, memory, registry, individual folders and more! Includes trusting items and excluding folders for complete customization of scanning!
* Detects and removes spyware, adware and malware, Trojans, keyboard loggers, dialer, programs for unauthorized reconfiguration and worms, and many other types of threats.
* Restores broken Internet connections, desktops, registry, task Manager and more with our unique system restore! Spyware application often disable system components to prevent removal â€“ SUPERAntiSpyware resets and restores these files in seconds!
* Files that are quarantined are removed to ensure complete safety. Quarantined files can be restored at your request.
* Provides a detailed log of the scan with complete information about detected threats and their location. The scan log will help you to view the scan results at any time.

In the new version of SuperAntiSpyware changes have affected the program interface, added new features and technology. The most significant changes: the ability to view the product version of the antivirus database and the date of renewal; integration into the Windows security Center; greatly reducing the consumption of RAM; increase the scanning speed by 30-50%; an enhanced ability to detect and remove threats in memory.

SUPERAntiSpyware is constructed so as not to interfere with other programs to ensure the safety of your computer. The program provides many unique and powerful technologies for the removal of spyware, unavailable for disposal of other anti-virus engines. Also SUPERAntiSpyware can restore the broken record in network connections on the desktop, in the system registry, to improve the overall security of the PC shutting detected during start up holes in Windows security.

SuperAntiSpyware easily remove this malware as VirusRay, AntiVirGear, VirusProtectPro, DriveCleaner, SmitFraud, Vundo, WinFixer, SpyAxe, SpyFalcon, WinAntiVirus, Antiparasite, AntiSpyGolden and more than 1 million such threats.
